name: unshorn
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A sheep or other animal that is unshorn has not had its wool or hair cut off: The sheep were left unshorn in this study. Shorn and unshorn animals were divided for the trial.
If someone is unshorn, their hair has not been cut. : His eyes were bloodshot and he was unshorn. He was ragged and unshorn.
Unshorn hair or wool has not been cut off: In Sikhism, unshorn hair is a symbol of spiritualism. unshorn fleeces
